trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around November 2nd 2009
divs: sighting detailsas i was driving off of the bay bridge (westbound into sf), i saw up high in the daytime sky (at approx 10\11 oclock) a stationary light which looked like a bright star. the object did not appear to move, but the strength of its light varied. this area is not in the normal zone for commercial aircraft. it was far too high to be to\from sfo, far too north for san jose airport and far too west for oakland airport. i saw the object for a couple minutes and then in the near instant it took for me to look at the time (3:04 pm) it disappeared.
Summary: star-like object, varying strength of light
